name: Black Knight Sword
description:
A fresh take on the classic fairy tale, Black Knight Sword is a twisted platforming adventure from the mind of Suda51. Take on the role of The Black Knight and wade through a twisted and dark world to kill the Dark Princess. With an unprecedented style and addictive gameplay that hearkens back to the classic 16-bit platformers of old, Black Knight Sword is a truly unforgettable experience.
